fields.name: On The Go Kit
fields.short_description:
Glow as you go with the Uncover mini’s for nourished skin, anytime, anywhere.

Vacation, bae-cation, girls night, work trip, a little traffic SPF reapplication, or a post gym cleanse… we’ve got you covered! The On-The-Go Kit is designed to fit effortlessly into the busy lives of the go-getters and glow-getters!

Convenient and compact with skin loving ingredients, the On-The-Go Kit is packed with three new mini editions of your essentials: Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser, Argan Hydrating Moisturiser, and the Aloe Invisible Sunscreen. Giving you healthier, glowing skin on the go.

Step 1: Cleanse – Mini Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser, 30ml

Step 2: Moisturise – Mini Argan Hydrating Moisturiser, 30ml

Step 3: Protect – Mini Aloe Invisible Sunscreen, 40ml

These mini’s contain the same scientifically proven formula as the larger tubes whilst still harnessing k-beauty skincare technology and African botanicals to meet your skincare needs.

Ready for your glow on the go?
fields.long_description:
Glow as you go with the Uncover mini’s for nourished skin, anytime, anywhere.

Vacation, bae-cation, girls night, work trip, a little traffic SPF reapplication, or a post gym cleanse… we’ve got you covered! The On-The-Go Kit is designed to fit effortlessly into the busy lives of the go-getters and glow-getters!

Convenient and compact with skin loving ingredients, the On-The-Go Kit is packed with three new mini editions of your essentials: Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser, Argan Hydrating Moisturiser, and the Aloe Invisible Sunscreen. Giving you healthier, glowing skin on the go.

Step 1: Cleanse – Mini Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser, 30ml

Step 2: Moisturise – Mini Argan Hydrating Moisturiser, 30ml

Step 3: Protect – Mini Aloe Invisible Sunscreen, 40ml

These mini’s contain the same scientifically proven formula as the larger tubes whilst still harnessing k-beauty skincare technology and African botanicals to meet your skincare needs.

Ready for your glow on the go?

fields.name: Complete 5 step skincare routine
fields.short_description:
Start your journey to healthier, glowing skin with our Complete 5 Step Skincare Routine. 

Carefully curated to give your skin the nourishment it needs in every step: 

  1. Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser
  2. Rooibos Glow Toner
  3. Baobab Glow-C Serum 
  4. Argan Hydrating Moisturiser 
  5. Aloe Invisible Sunscreen
fields.long_description:
Start your journey to healthier, glowing skin with our Complete 5 Step Skincare Routine. 

Carefully curated to give your skin the nourishment it needs in every step: 

  1. Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser
  2. Rooibos Glow Toner
  3. Baobab Glow-C Serum 
  4. Argan Hydrating Moisturiser 
  5. Aloe Invisible Sunscreen

fields.name: Aloe Invisible Sunscreen
fields.short_description: No white cast, lightweight SPF 50+ sunscreen infused with Hyaluronic Acid and African Aloe Vera, perfect for daily use.
fields.long_description: No white cast, lightweight SPF 50+ sunscreen infused with Hyaluronic Acid and African Aloe Vera, perfect for daily use.

fields.name: Baobab Glow-C Serum
fields.short_description: Infused with super ingredients to give you ‘The Glow-C Effect’. Powered by 8% Vitamin C, 2% Arbutin and African Baobab to visibly brighten and even the skin tone. Leaves skin feeling healthy, protected and nourished.
fields.long_description:
Experience the Glow-C Effect!

This nourishing Baobab Glow-C serum is powered by 8% Vitamin C, 2% Arbutin and African Baobab. Intentionally packaged in an airless pump to protect the Serum from breaking down due to heat and light exposure, keeping it as stable as possible to give you the best results.

We have been carefully crafting this Vitamin C serum for 2 years, studying the science of glow with our team of formulation scientists in the worlds best labs to bring you the best quality products backed by industry experts. Harnessing advanced, innovative K-Beauty technology with African Botanicals.

We worked closely with women across Kenya to co-create this product, from receiving valuable packaging feedback to testing the Baobab Glow-C Serum formula and adapting it accordingly to make sure we meet the skincare needs of our community across Africa.

Ingredient Benefits

The Baobab Glow-C Serum visibly brightens skin and evens the skin tone, leaving skin feeling healthy, protected and nourished.

  • Vitamin C:  Reduces hyperpigmentation, hydrates and brightens skin. Filled with antioxidants to fight free radicals protecting skin from environmental damage. Super “C” also prevents collagen breakdown to keep skin firm.
  • Arbutin: Works hard to brighten any discoloration of the skin as well as even out your skin tone and improve the appearance of acne scars.
  • African Baobab: Filled with antioxidants to rejuvenate and even out your skin tone. Baobab soothes skin to reduce redness and irritation.

Who Can Use It

This product can be used on all skin types, addressing the specific skincare concerns for those that experience discolouration and/or dull and uneven skin.

Directions

  • Apply 2-3 drops on cleansed and dry skin. Gently pat it onto your skin in the AM or PM, or both.
  •  Incorporate the serum into your routine after you cleanser and/or tone and before you moisturise. Follow up with SPF 30+ if used during the day.

fields.name: Essentials Skincare Kit
fields.short_description:
Skincare starts here!

These are the 3 basic steps needed to start with when building your daily skincare routine. 

  • Step 1: Cleanse – Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser
  • Step 2: Moisturise – Argan Hydrating Moisturiser
  • Step 3: Protect – Aloe Invisible Sunscreen
fields.long_description:
Skincare can be overwhelming and hard to know where to begin. Cleansing, moisturising, and SPF  form the basis of any routine and this kit is your starting point!

Uncover healthier, glowing skin in just 3 simple steps:

Step 1:Cleanse – Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser 

Deeply cleanses the skin and unclogs pores removing any additional impurities and excess oil without stripping moisture. Powered by soothing and antioxidant properties, this cleanser minimises the appearance of pores and reduces inflammation for a clearer complexion.

Directions: 

Use an adequate amount on dampened skin either AM, PM or both then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

Step 2 :Moisturise- Argan Hydrating Moisturiser

Lightweight, non-pore clogging and, hydrating moisturiser. Powered by active ingredients, brightening properties and antioxidant benefits to protect the skin barrier while brightening and nourishing dull skin.

Directions: 

Use generously twice daily after cleansing. Follow with Uncover’s SPF 50+ Aloe Invisible Sunscreen in the AM for best results.

Step 3: Protect – Aloe Invisible Sunscreen

SPF 50+ sunscreen infused with Hyaluronic Acid and African Aloe Vera Benefits: Protects skin from harmful UVA & UVB rays, prevents sun damage, premature skin ageing and dark spots, while keeping skin hydrated, moisturised, and cool. No white cast and lightweight perfect for daily use.

Directions: 

Apply generously all over your face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours.

fields.name: PIMPLE PATCH | I AM SPOTLESS
fields.short_description: Don’t let breakouts wear you down. We are here to help you beat those pimples!
fields.long_description: Don’t let breakouts wear you down. We are here to help you beat those pimples!

fields.name: Argan Hydrating Moisturiser
fields.short_description:
Intense Hydration Boost

Powered by 3% Squalane, 2% Niacinamide, 1% African Argan Oil, Hyaluronic Acid and Moringa Extract to nourish, revive, and deeply moisturise and hydrate your skin without clogging pores.
fields.long_description:
The ultimate moisturiser with a boost of hydration

This lightweight and deeply hydrating moisturiser is infused with 3% Squalane, 2% Niacinamide, 1% African Argan Oil, Hyaluronic Acid and Moringa Extract to nourish and revive your skin. Powered by active ingredients, brightening properties and antioxidant benefits to protect the skin barrier, remove impurities and brighten dull skin. The unique formula deeply moisturises skin without clogging pores. 

We have been carefully crafting this moisturiser for 2 years, studying the science of healthy skin with our team of formulation scientists in the world’s best labs to bring you the best quality products backed by industry experts. Harnessing advanced, innovative K-Beauty technology with African Botanicals.

We worked closely with women across Kenya to co-create this product, from receiving valuable packaging feedback to testing the Argan Hydrating Moisturiser and adapting it accordingly to make sure we meet the skincare needs of our community across Africa.

fields.name: Glow Mama Skincare Kit
fields.short_description:
Treat mum to a glow she deserves with our specially curated Glow Mama Skincare Kit.

  • ‘I Am Beau-tea-ful’ Green Tea sheet mask 
  • ‘I Am Brilliant’ Vitamin C sheet mask 
  • ‘I Am Cool’ Aloe vera 
  • Baobab Glow-C Serum
  • Aloe Invisible Sunscreen
fields.long_description:
For all the love and care mums show, treat them to an Uncover Skincare glow. 

Our Glow Mama Skincare Kit is powered with African botanicals to keep mum’s skin healthy and glowing: 

  • ‘I Am Cool’ – Infused with anti-inflammatory Aloe vera to cool and soothe the skin.
  • ‘I Am Brilliant’ – Infused with brightening Vitamin C to reduce dark marks, hyperpigmentation and brighten skin.
  • ‘I Am Beau-tea-ful’ – Infused with antioxidant Green Tea to minimize the appearance of pores, reduce inflammation, and protect the skin barrier.
  • Baobab Glow-C Serum – Infused with super ingredients to give mum ‘The Glow-C Effect’. Powered by 8% Vitamin C, 2% Arbutin and African Baobab to visibly brighten and even the skin tone. Leaves skin feeling healthy, protected, and nourished.
  • Aloe Invisible Sunscreen- SPF 50+ infused with Hyaluronic Acid and African Aloe Vera. Protects skin from harmful UVA & UVB rays, prevents sun damage, premature skin ageing and dark spots, while keeping skin hydrated, moisturised, and cool. No white cast and lightweight perfect for daily use.

fields.name: Neulii exfoliating toner pads for sensitive skin
fields.short_description:
The perfect balance of chemical and physical exfoliation

Neulii exfoliating toner pads for sensitive skin are infused with Beta Hydroxy Acids and Poly Hydroxy Acids which work together to gently exfoliate the skin removing dead skin cells and unclog pores over time revealing a fresh layer of skin.

Made in Korea
fields.long_description:
Chemical exfoliation coupled with gentle physical exfoliation to gently get rid of dead skin cells and rough skin without stripping away moisture. The peeling pads are soaked in Beta Hydroxy Acids (BHA’s) which remove oil, dirt, debris, great for eliminating black/ whiteheads with their anti-inflammatory and anti-microbial properties and Poly Hydroxy Acids (PHA’s) which gently remove dead surface cells, hydrate and smoothen skin, PHA’s also work best with sensitive skin. These Neulii peeling pads are both chemical and gentle physical exfoliators.

Use in the AM to help makeup glide onto face and in the PM for deeply cleansing skin and pores.

fields.name: Neulii Cica-Pepta Repair Serum
fields.short_description:
Repair serum infused with Centella asiatica and peptides

Neulii Cica-Pepta Repair Serum, protects the skin barrier, heals the skin and promotes firmer, healthier skin.
fields.long_description:
A damaged skin barrier causes dryness, sensitivity and accelerated ageing, Cicapepta repair serum nourishes and revitalises the skin barrier to combat sensitivity, dryness and damage using key ingredients “Cica” (Centella Asiatica, an age-old Korean skincare ingredient) which helps calm and soothe the skin with its antibacterial and inflammatory properties restoring damaged skin caused from the external environment and “peptides” that accelerate skin healing, increase skin renewal, slow down ageing, reduce wrinkles, boost collagen and elastin synthesis and promote skin rejuvenation. Great for sensitive skin.

 

For best results, apply a moderate amount onto clean and toned skin and gently pat to allow for absorption.

fields.name: UNCOVER Sheet Mask Multipack Bundle
fields.short_description:
3 Face Masks:

1 Aloe Vera Mask,

1 Green Tea Mask,

1 Vitamin C Mask,

Each Mask has 25g of nourishing serum.

Get healthy, glowing skin.
fields.long_description:
WHAT ELSE YOU NEED TO KNOW

Sheet masks are a global phenomenon and a must-have in your beauty regimen. They’re easy to use and the results are immediate: healthy, glowing skin.

TIPS & TRICKS

Tip: For a long-lasting glow, use an I am Brilliant Vitamin C mask for consecutive days and say buh-bye to make-up.
Tip: For best results, use after cleansing & toning skin.
Trick: Rub the excess serum on neck, arms, and hands for soft skin

fields.name: I AM BRILLIANT – VITAMIN C BRIGHTENING SHEET MASK
fields.short_description: With an instant dose of Vitamin C, this sheet mask brightens dull and uneven toned skin in just 20 minutes for healthy, glowing skin.
fields.long_description:
WHAT ELSE YOU NEED TO KNOW

Sheet masks are a global phenomenon and a must-have in your beauty regimen. They’re easy to use and the results are immediate: healthy, glowing skin.

fields.name: Rooibos Glow Toner
fields.short_description:
Rebalancing, gentle exfoliating toner 

This daily toner is infused with 1% PHA, Hyaluronic Acid, Kombucha and African Rooibos Leaf Extract to protect the skin barrier by balancing skin pH.
fields.long_description:
Purified, balanced skin 

This daily toner is infused with 1% PHA, Hyaluronic Acid, Kombucha and African Rooibos Leaf Extract to protect the skin barrier by balancing skin pH. Formulated to visibly even skin texture and gently exfoliate to boost skin cell regeneration. Powered by anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, this toner removes additional impurities while hydrating and restoring the skin.

We have been carefully crafting this toner for 2 years, studying the science of healthy skin with our team of formulation scientists in the world’s best labs to bring you the best quality products backed by industry experts. Harnessing advanced, innovative K-Beauty technology with African Botanicals.

We worked closely with women across Kenya to co-create this product, from receiving valuable packaging feedback to testing the Rooibos Glow Toner and adapting it accordingly to make sure we meet the skincare needs of our community across Africa.

fields.name: Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser
fields.short_description:
Detoxifying, soothing cleanser 

This daily foam cleanser is infused with 0.5% Salicylic Acid, Green Tea and African Rice Extract to deeply cleanse the skin, removing impurities and excess oil without stripping the skin’s moisture.
fields.long_description:
Refreshed skin with a healthy glow 

This daily foam cleanser is infused with 0.5% Salicylic Acid, Green Tea and African Rice Extract to deeply cleanse the skin, removing impurities and excess oil without stripping the skin’s moisture. Powered by soothing and antioxidant properties, this cleanser minimizes the appearance of pores and reduces inflammation for a clearer complexion.  

We have been carefully crafting this cleanser for 2 years, studying the science of healthy skin with our team of formulation scientists in the world’s best labs to bring you the best quality products backed by industry experts. Harnessing advanced, innovative K-Beauty technology with African Botanicals.

We worked closely with women across Kenya to co-create this product, from receiving valuable packaging feedback to testing the Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser and adapting it accordingly to make sure we meet the skincare needs of our community across Africa.

fields.short_description: With an instant dose of Vitamin C, this sheet mask brightens dull and uneven toned skin in just 20 minutes for healthy, glowing skin. Three pieces in the package

fields.short_description: Soothe and hydrate tired, stressed skin in just 20 minutes with Aloe Vera extract for healthy, glowing skin.

fields.name: 10 pack Sheet Mask Bundle
fields.short_description:
Bundle of selfcare.

This 10 pack sheet mask bundle makes the perfect pamper session for yourself or for that special someone. 

PS: Using sheet masks 2-3 times a week is sure to result in a long lasting glow and hydration. In Ancient Korea, women sheet-mask regularly for exactly this reason. 

Buy one-month’s worth of supply  – 10 masks – but pay for 9 (1 free mask – yay!). Starting mask amounts:  3 Green Tea, 3 Aloe Vera, 3 Vitamin C and one extra free sheet mask!
fields.long_description:
Bundle of selfcare.

This 10 pack sheet mask bundle makes the perfect pamper session for yourself or for that special someone. 

PS: Using sheet masks 2-3 times a week is sure to result in a long lasting glow and hydration. In Ancient Korea, women sheet-mask regularly for exactly this reason. 

Buy one-month’s worth of supply  – 10 masks – but pay for 9 (1 free mask – yay!). Starting mask amounts:  3 Green Tea, 3 Aloe Vera, 3 Vitamin C and one extra free sheet mask!

Details

  • Uncover Sheet masks  are available in 3 variants including vitamin C infused “I Am Brilliant”; calming aloe vera in “I Am Cool” and antioxidant packed green tea in the “I Am Beau-tea-ful” sheet mask.  A sheet mask essentially gives a more concentrated dose of serum to your skin since the cotton fabric prevents loss of serum into the air & ultimately, gives you an instant glow in just 20 minutes (with the added benefit of multi-masking – sheet mask anywhere, anytime!) . 

In this 10 pack bundle you get to experience the goodness of each sheet mask:

  • “I Am Brilliant”– skin prone to hyperpigmentation, marks, needs some brightening & a GLOW on the go. 
  • “I Am Cool” – skin prone to inflammation, heat rashes, redness, irritation, great for sun burnt skin, sensitive skin & a GLOW on the go.
  • “I Am Beau-tea-ful” – Skin with large pores, prone to acne, skin with fine wrinkles, prone irritation & a GLOW on the go.

fields.name: I AM BEAU-TEA-FUL – GREEN TEA DETOXIFYING SHEET MASK
fields.short_description: Clarify and minimize the appearance of pores in 20 minutes with the antioxidant powers of Green Tea for healthy, glowing skin.

WHAT ELSE YOU NEED TO KNOW

fields.name: Glow and Protect Duo
fields.short_description: Clarify and minimize the appearance of pores in 20 minutes with the antioxidant powers of Green Tea for healthy, glowing skin. Three pieces in the package
fields.long_description:
Experience enhanced UV protection with our glow and protect duo.

Baobab Glow-C Serum

This nourishing Baobab Glow-C serum is powered by 8% Vitamin C, 2% Arbutin and African Baobab. Intentionally packaged in an airless pump to protect the Serum from breaking down due to heat and light exposure, keeping it as stable as possible to give you the best results, what we like to call the ‘Glow-C Effect.’ 

Vitamin C optimizes SPF by neutralizing free radicals protecting the skin from damage and in the process enhances the effectiveness of SPF.

Ingredient Benefits

The Baobab Glow-C Serum visibly brightens skin and evens the skin tone, leaving skin feeling healthy, protected and nourished.

  • Vitamin C:  Reduces hyperpigmentation, hydrates and brightens skin. Filled with antioxidants to fight free radicals protecting skin from environmental damage. Super “C” also prevents collagen breakdown to keep skin firm.
  • Arbutin: Works hard to brighten any discoloration of the skin as well as even out your skin tone and improve the appearance of acne scars.
  • African Baobab: Filled with antioxidants to rejuvenate and even out your skin tone. Baobab soothes skin to reduce redness and irritation.

Directions

  • Apply 2-3 drops on cleansed and dry skin. Gently pat it onto your skin in the AM or PM, or both.
  •  Incorporate the serum into your routine after you cleanser and/or tone and before you moisturise. Follow up with SPF 30+ if used during the day.

Aloe Invisible Sunscreen 

This no white cast, lightweight SPF 50+ sunscreen infused with Hyaluronic Acid and African Aloe Vera is perfect for daily use. Protects skin from harmful UVA & UVB rays, prevents sun damage, premature skin ageing and dark spots, while keeping skin hydrated, moisturised and cool.

Ingredient Benefits:

  • SPF 50+– Sun Protection Factor of 50+ gives high level of protection from UV rays. Helps prevent sun damage, premature ageing, sunspots, and hyperpigmentation. 
  • Hyaluronic Acid– Extremely hydrating ingredient. Increases water content of skin by binding to water molecules, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Plumps skin and increases skin elasticity.
  • Aloe Vera – Hydrates, cools, and soothes the skin with its anti-inflammatory properties.

Directions: 

  • Apply generously all over face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours.

fields.name: Hydrate and Protect Duo
fields.short_description:
Argan Hydrating Moisturiser + Aloe Invisible Sunscreen 

Save 10% on this hydrating and protecting bundle made just for U!

Nourish and protect your skin with this power duo powered by Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, Squalane, Moringa Extract and Aloe Vera.
fields.long_description:
Say goodbye to dull skin with this intense hydration boost and no white-cast, ultra protection SPF 50+.

Argan Hydrating Moisturiser

This lightweight and deeply hydrating moisturiser is infused with 3% Squalane, 2% Niacinamide, 1% African Argan Oil, Hyaluronic Acid and Moringa Extract to nourish and revive your skin. Powered by active ingredients, brightening properties and antioxidant benefits to protect the skin barrier, remove impurities and brighten dull skin. The unique formula deeply moisturises skin without clogging pores. 

Ingredient Benefits:

  • Argan Oil – Deeply moisturises skin while improving water retention. Contains anti-ageing benefits and soothing properties to revive skin.
  • Niacinamide – Regulates sebum production, helps reduce break outs and clogged pores and improves skin texture.  
  • Squalane- Helps strengthen and protect the skin barrier, contains anti-ageing properties, soothes, and nourishes the skin. 
  • Hyaluronic Acid- Extremely hydrating ingredient. Increases water content of skin by binding to water molecules, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Plumps skin and increases skin elasticity. 
  • Moringa- Filled with antioxidants which help protect the skin against pollutants. Moringa also has anti-bacterial and anti-ageing properties which reduce breakouts and the appearance of fine lines

Directions

  • Use a coin-sized amount generously twice daily, after your serum, toner or cleanser. 
  • Follow with Uncover’s SPF 50+ Aloe Invisible Sunscreen in the AM for best results

Aloe Invisible Sunscreen 

This no white cast, lightweight SPF 50+ sunscreen infused with Hyaluronic Acid and African Aloe Vera is perfect for daily use. Protects skin from harmful UVA & UVB rays, prevents sun damage, premature skin ageing and dark spots, while keeping skin hydrated, moisturised and cool.

Ingredient Benefits:

  • SPF 50+– Sun Protection Factor of 50+ gives high level of protection from UV rays. Helps prevent sun damage, premature ageing, sunspots, and hyperpigmentation. 
  • Hyaluronic Acid– Extremely hydrating ingredient. Increases water content of skin by binding to water molecules, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Plumps skin and increases skin elasticity.
  • Aloe Vera – Hydrates, cools, and soothes the skin with its anti-inflammatory properties.

Directions: 

  • Apply generously all over face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply every 2 hours.

fields.name: Balance and Glow Duo
fields.short_description:
Save 10% with this Balance and Glow Duo.

Get healthier, balanced skin with our Rooibos Glow Toner and Baobab Glow- C Serum powered by super ingredients: Rooibos, Kombucha, Hyaluronic acid, African Baobab, Arbutin and Vitamin C.
fields.long_description:
Rooibos Glow Toner 

This daily toner is infused with 1% PHA, Hyaluronic Acid, Kombucha and African Rooibos Leaf Extract to protect the skin barrier by balancing skin pH. Formulated to visibly even skin texture and gently exfoliate to boost skin cell regeneration. Powered by anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties, this toner removes additional impurities while hydrating and restoring the skin.

Ingredient Benefits 

The Rooibos Glow Toner is infused with active ingredients that work together to rebalance the skin, remove excess impurities and dead skin cells, encouraging cell regeneration. 

  • PHA (Poly Hydroxy Acid) – Gentle, mild exfoliating acid that removes dead skin cells, improves texture of skin, and protects the skin against external pollutants. 
  • Hyaluronic Acid– Extremely hydrating ingredient. Increases water content of skin by binding to water molecules, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Plumps skin and increases skin elasticity.
  • Kombucha– Contains natural pro-biotics which helps to balance the skin, improve the skin barrier, and increase skin hydration. 
  • African Rooibos Leaf– Strong antioxidant that protects the skin barrier and acts as an anti-ageing ingredient. Contains anti-inflammatory properties that soothes and calms the skin.

Directions

  • Use a few drops twice daily after cleansing. 
  • Apply with either your hands or a cotton pad and spread evenly over your face and neck. Follow with Baobab Glow-C serum.

Baobab Glow-C Serum

This nourishing Baobab Glow-C serum is powered by 8% Vitamin C, 2% Arbutin and African Baobab. Intentionally packaged in an airless pump to protect the Serum from breaking down due to heat and light exposure, keeping it as stable as possible to give you the best results, what we like to call the ‘Glow-C Effect.’ 

Vitamin C optimizes SPF by neutralizing free radicals protecting the skin from damage and in the process enhances the effectiveness of SPF.

Ingredient Benefits

The Baobab Glow-C Serum visibly brightens skin and evens the skin tone, leaving skin feeling healthy, protected and nourished.

  • Vitamin C:  Reduces hyperpigmentation, hydrates and brightens skin. Filled with antioxidants to fight free radicals protecting skin from environmental damage. Super “C” also prevents collagen breakdown to keep skin firm.
  • Arbutin: Works hard to brighten any discoloration of the skin as well as even out your skin tone and improve the appearance of acne scars.
  • African Baobab: Filled with antioxidants to rejuvenate and even out your skin tone. Baobab soothes skin to reduce redness and irritation.

Directions

  • Apply 2-3 drops on cleansed and dry skin. Gently pat it onto your skin in the AM or PM, or both.
  •  Incorporate the serum into your routine after you cleanse and/or tone your skin and before you moisturise. Follow with Aloe invisible sunscreen in the AM.

fields.name: Revitalise and Hydrate Duo
fields.short_description:
Save 10% with this Revitalise and Hydrate Duo.

Revive and nourish your skin with our Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser and  Argan Hydrating Moisturiser duo powered by super ingredients:Green Tea, Salicylic acid, African Rice Extract, Argan Oil and Moringa.
fields.long_description:
Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser

This daily foam cleanser is infused with 0.5% Salicylic Acid, Green Tea and African Rice Extract to deeply cleanse the skin, removing impurities and excess oil without stripping the skin’s moisture. Powered by soothing and antioxidant properties, this cleanser minimizes the appearance of pores and reduces inflammation for a clearer complexion.  

Ingredient Benefits: 

  • The Green Tea Revitalising Cleanser is infused with active ingredients that work together to deeply cleanse the skin, remove excess oil and impurities, minimise the appearance of pores all without leave the skin feeling dry and stretched.
  • Salicylic Acid- Deeply cleanses the skin, unclogs pores removing excess dirt and sebum preventing future breakouts.
  • African Rice Extract– Contains antioxidants which protect the skin from external pollutants, helps cleanse and refresh skin deeply leaving skin looking brighter and refreshed. 
  • Green Tea – Contains anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties which help soothe skin, minimise pores and protect the skin barrier.

Directions: 

  • Use an adequate amount twice daily on dampened skin as the first step in your routine. 
  • Rinse thoroughly with water. Follow with Uncover’s Rooibos Glow Toner for best results.

 Argan Hydrating Moisturiser

This lightweight and deeply hydrating moisturiser is infused with 3% Squalane, 2% Niacinamide, 1% African Argan Oil, Hyaluronic Acid and Moringa Extract to nourish and revive your skin. Powered by active ingredients, brightening properties and antioxidant benefits to protect the skin barrier, remove impurities and brighten dull skin. The unique formula deeply moisturises skin without clogging pores. 

Ingredient benefits: 

The Argan hydrating moisturiser is infused with active ingredients that work together to hydrate, moisturise, nourish, and revive the skin.

  • Argan Oil – Deeply moisturises skin while improving water retention. Contains anti-ageing benefits and soothing properties to revive skin.
  • Niacinamide – Regulates sebum production, helps reduce break outs and clogged pores and improves skin texture.  
  • Squalane- Helps strengthen and protect the skin barrier, contains anti-ageing properties, soothes, and nourishes the skin. 
  • Hyaluronic Acid- Extremely hydrating ingredient. Increases water content of skin by binding to water molecules, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Plumps skin and increases skin elasticity. 
  • Moringa- Filled with antioxidants which help protect the skin against pollutants. Moringa also has anti-bacterial and anti-ageing properties which reduce breakouts and the appearance of fine lines

Directions: 

  • Use a coin-sized amount generously twice daily, after your serum, toner or cleanser. 
  • Follow with Uncover’s SPF 50+ Aloe Invisible Sunscreen in the AM for best results.
